name: Bloodmetal
description:
Bloodmetal is a physics based VR game in development. Planned to be fast paced and action heavy. It implements push-forward combat, which means you are encouraged to attack the enemy at low health rather than run from them.

The story revolves around a cyborg who is humanity's last hope after machines went berserk and killed most of earth's population.

Headsets supported:  Quest Link, Rift

The game will support all OpenXR compatible headsets in the future.
